• Pain can be managed with ice packs and/or oral paracetamol one gram orally four times daily.
• The mother should return to the clinic if pain worsens or does not respond to simple measures.
• First and second degree tears heal faster than episiotomies.
• With episiotomy, it may take up to one month before sexual intercourse can resume.
